item.title: Sample Page
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I am

Neve Scholar

I am a professional life coach and trainer with an original love for nature, people and training. See how I can help you become a better version of yourself.

about me

I learned that if I want to get somewhere quick, I'll going alone. But if I want to go far, I'll take somebody with me. In life, and in everything you do, Attitude decides Altitude!

See my videos

Experience

5 Years

Articles

15 written so far

Coached

287 people

Why Coach others?

Better you

I will help you find out how you can be the best version of yourself that you can be.

The right path

We often find it difficult to decide which path to take in life and professionally.

Powering up

Everybody has potential to do things. With a little help you'll get to the next level.

Leading others

Once you've found your better self you can help others achieve your level.

Open courses on life coaching and balance

Life Coaching 101

In this open course I present simple and explicitly the extraordinary life coaching programs dedicated to teams or groups who want to increase their professional, relational and financial performance.

Get your spot

Subscribe for courses

My lectures on life

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UF8uR6Z6KLchttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9mPtkVAoPQ

CONTACT ME

Let me help you

Stay updated with my latest news and upcoming courses. I encourage you to contact me for a tailored plan.

Facebook Twitter Google-plus Youtube

item.title: scholar
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I am

Neve Scholar

I am a professional life coach and trainer with an original love for nature, people and training. See how I can help you become a better version of yourself.

about me

I learned that if I want to get somewhere quick, I'll going alone. But if I want to go far, I'll take somebody with me. In life, and in everything you do, Attitude decides Altitude!

See my videos

Experience

5 Years

Articles

15 written so far

Coached

287 people

Why Coach others?

Better you

I will help you find out how you can be the best version of yourself that you can be.

The right path

We often find it difficult to decide which path to take in life and professionally.

Powering up

Everybody has potential to do things. With a little help you'll get to the next level.

Leading others

Once you've found your better self you can help others achieve your level.

Open courses on life coaching and balance

Life Coaching 101

In this open course I present simple and explicitly the extraordinary life coaching programs dedicated to teams or groups who want to increase their professional, relational and financial performance.

Get your spot

Subscribe for updates on upcoming courses

The Access Key setting is required! The List ID setting is required!

My lectures on life

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_Ehttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E

CONTACT ME

Let me help you

Stay updated with my latest news and upcoming courses. I encourage you to contact me for a tailored plan.

Facebook Twitter Google-plus Youtube
